clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of malaria Also under investigation for the modulation of multidrug resistance in cancer cells

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Voacamine is an anti malarial extracted from the Brazilian tree i Peschiera fuchsiaefolia i In one study PMID 11180519 the in vivo antiplasmodial activity of voacamine was assessed in a 4 day test It was shown to exhibit in vivo activity with 25 4 and 43 4 inhibition of parasitaemia with 2 5 and 10 mg kg respectively In synchronized cultures it was found to act on trophozoite and schizont stages of i Plasmodium falciparum i Voacamine is a bisindolic alkaloid under investigation for modulation of multidrug resistance to enhance anticancer drugs such as doxorubicin
